thread.section_title: Spotahome opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Spotahome | www.spotahome.com | 2 de 22
thread.title: Patrícia Rosa

author: Patrícia Rosa
title: Patrícia Rosa
text:
Renting for the first time with spotahome I booked a place to stay and had problems with the landlord. His policies were not clear in the description of his property and it was for one person only and not to have visitors.
It didn't suit me as I needed a place for a couple and would like to have family and friends over.
I contacted spotahome and explained the situation and Joshua was very kind and helpful trying to solve the problem.
Right now spotahone team is doing their best to find me an apartment that suits my needs!!!
Very good service and costumer support I highly recommend spotahome.
